name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Darvin BRITCHER, Appellant
docket_number: Appeal No. 47 Middle District Appeal Docket 1990

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Darvin BRITCHER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Superior Court, 386 Pa.Super. 515, 563 A.2d 502, affirmed.
ZAPPALA and CAPPY, JJ., note their dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: R. Scott Cramer, Dist. Atty., Gloria J. McPherson, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
592 A.2d 686
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Darvin BRITCHER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 6, 1991.
Decided July 19, 1991.
Daniel Stern, for appellant.
R. Scott Cramer, Dist. Atty., Gloria J. McPherson, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
